subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony scored 29 points in 28 minutes, including 19 points in the first quarter, as the Knicks cruised to a victory over the Hornets on Tuesday night.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony scored 29 points in 28 minutes, including 19 points in the first quarter, as the Knicks cruised to a victory over the Hornets on Tuesday night.
